By streamlining these processes, the company achieved a 17% increase in annual revenue over the past few years. tags: Code, UX/UI, Project managment {imagem} nome: germanico.png tamanho: P tags: Design, Project managment {} Disruptive project with measurable impact: Estadão’s new print format. I led the newspaper’s full redesign — from industrial press reconfiguration and advertiser communication to graphic design, newsroom training, and content migration to digital. As project manager, I also directed the business plan and execution that made the transformation feasible.

Despite concerns that a compact format might reduce readership or ad revenue, the rollout was successful and widely recognized as a modernization of the brand — delivering significant operational savings and driving an estimated R$7 million increase in EBITDA in 2022, reinforcing the newspaper’s long-term market relevance.

about.content:
imagem: fabio_sales.png, PP I am a designer, consultant, and executive leader with more than 20 years of experience shaping visual culture in journalism and driving digital transformation. From 2005 to 2023, I led the creation of the visual identity at Estadão, Brazil’s oldest newspaper, working with a multidisciplinary team of photographers, designers, infographic artists, illustrators, and data journalists to transform complex ideas into impactful visual storytelling. Since 2023, I have expanded my expertise as a digital transformation consultant, helping organizations in Brazil and abroad implement ERP systems, optimize workflows, and create user-centered digital experiences. My skills span front-end and back-end development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Svelte, WordPress, Python), process automation, and advanced data visualization. Today, I serve as Director of Transformation and Innovation at ATBL. In previous years, I also taught and lectured on infographics, data visualization, and visual storytelling at institutions such as ESPM, Senac, and international design conferences. Recognized as a LinkedIn Top Voice and considered an individual of extraordinary ability for visa purposes, I combine design, technology, and strategy to help organizations thrive in the digital era. Professional Highlights:
• ATBL (2025–Present): Director of Transformation & Innovation
• Independent Consultant (2023–2025): Digital transformation, ERP, process automation, and data visualization
• Estadão (2005–2023): Executive leader shaping visual culture for print & digital; led redesign and innovation projects
• Diário de Notícias (2003–2005, Portugal): Art Director; led redesign recognized as the best-designed newspaper in Iberia by SND-e
• Correio Braziliense (2000–2003): Assistant Executive Editor of Art; newsroom became Latin America’s most awarded by SND (2001)
• La República (Peru, 2003), Diario Gestión (Peru, 2012), Milenio (Mexico, 2023): International consulting and design projects
• Lecturer & Speaker: Past teaching roles at ESPM and Senac; invited speaker at SND and Malofiej conferences
